Command.Description: Objective: To progress to the next area, you must defeat this one's boss. Then proceed to the stairs going downwards and use the command 'climb/go down'. Commands: move, pick, equip, unequip, drop, target, attack, open, close, inspect, climb, eat, increase. Type 'help command' for specific information. Type 'help shortcuts' for information on numpad shortcuts.

Command.Name: Move
Command.Description: move/go direction/down Move in the specified direction. Down means go down the stairs to the next dungeon level. Type 'help direction(s)' for a list of directions.

Command.Name: Pick
Command.Description: pick/get/grab/take amount item name; Example: take 4 bread Pick the specified item and place it in your inventory. If amount is not specified it defaults to 1.

Command.Name: Equip
Command.Description: 'equip item name' or 'equip item index in inventory' Equip the specified item. If that equipment slot is already occupied by another item, that item will be placed in your inventory.

Command.Name: Unequip
Command.Description: 'unequip item name' or 'unequip item index in inventory' Unequip the specified item and place it in your inventory.

Command.Name: Drop
Command.Description: drop item name [in container] Drop the specified item from your inventory. If no container(chest/corpse) is specified, the item will be dropped on the ground.

Command.Name: Target
Command.Description: target direction Sets the enemy located on the adjacent square in the specified direction as your target. Type 'help direction(s)' for a list of directions.

Command.Name: Attack
Command.Description: attack [direction] Attack the enemy to the specified direction of you. If no direction is given, attack the target instead. Type 'help direction(s)' for a list of directions.

Command.Name: Open
Command.Description: open chest/door Open the specified structure.

Command.Name: Close
Command.Description: close chest/door Close the specified structure.

Command.Name: Inspect
Command.Description: inspect self: Display information about yourself. inspect continer: Display the contents of the specified container(chest/corpse) inspect item name [from container]: Display the information about the specified item. If the item is inside a container(chest/corpse) it must be specified.

Command.Name: Climb
Command.Description: climb down Go down the stairs to the next dungeon level.

Command.Name: Eat
Command.Description: 'eat item name' or 'eat item index in inventory' Eat the specified item to regain some health.

Command.Name: Increase
Command.Description: increase stat (strength, agility, vitality) Increase the specified attribute by 1.

Command.Name: Direction
Command.Description: north(n), northeast(ne), east(e), southeast(se), south(s), southwest(sw), west(w), northwest(nw)

Command.Name: Directions
Command.Description: north(n), northeast(ne), east(e), southeast(se), south(s), southwest(sw), west(w), northwest(nw)

Command.Name: Shortcuts
Command.Description: Numpad: 7 - move nw, 8 - move n, 9 - move ne, 6 - move e, 3 - move se, 2 - move s, 1 - move sw, 4 - move w, 5 - attack target
